rooms.description: You are in a dusty old library with shelves full of books. To the north, you see a doorway.
rooms.verboseDescription: The room is dimly lit, and the air smells musty. Dust motes dance in the light streaming through the windows. There is a doorway to the north.

objects.name: book
objects.description: An old, weathered book on the top shelf.
objects.roomDescription: An old, weathered book sits on the shelf.
objects.generalRoomDescription: There is a book on the shelf.

objects.name: table
objects.description: A wooden table covered in dust.
objects.roomDescription: A wooden table covered in dust is in the center of the room.
objects.generalRoomDescription: There is a wooden table covered in dust.

rooms.description: You find yourself in a kitchen with a large stove and a dining table. To the south, you see a doorway. To the east, you see a garden.
rooms.verboseDescription: The room is clean and organized. The smell of freshly baked bread fills the air. There is a doorway to the south and a garden to the east.

objects.name: stove
objects.roomDescription: A modern stainless steel stove stands against the wall.
objects.generalRoomDescription: There is a modern stainless steel stove.

objects.name: table
objects.description: A wooden dining table set for a meal.
objects.roomDescription: A wooden dining table is set for a meal.
objects.generalRoomDescription: There is a wooden dining table.

rooms.description: You are in a garden surrounded by blooming flowers and lush greenery. To the west, you see a doorway. To the north, you see a basement entrance.
rooms.verboseDescription: The garden is peaceful and full of life. Birds are chirping and flitting around. There is a doorway to the west and a basement entrance to the north.

objects.name: flowers
objects.description: Vibrant and colorful flowers of various kinds.
objects.roomDescription: Vibrant and colorful flowers of various kinds bloom throughout the garden.
objects.generalRoomDescription: There are vibrant and colorful flowers of various kinds.

objects.name: bench
objects.roomDescription: A sturdy wooden bench offers a place to sit and enjoy the garden.
objects.generalRoomDescription: There is a sturdy wooden bench.

rooms.description: You find yourself in a spooky basement with cobwebs and dim lighting. To the south, you see a garden. To the east, you see a treasure room.
rooms.verboseDescription: The air is damp and cold. Strange sounds echo through the darkness. There is a garden to the south and a treasure room to the east.

objects.name: spiderweb
objects.description: A thick, sticky spiderweb stretching across the corner.
objects.roomDescription: A thick, sticky spiderweb stretches across the corner of the room.
objects.generalRoomDescription: There is a thick, sticky spiderweb.

objects.name: box
objects.description: A small, mysterious box covered in dust.
objects.roomDescription: A small, mysterious box covered in dust sits on a shelf.
objects.generalRoomDescription: There is a small, mysterious box covered in dust.

rooms.description: You are in a treasure room with glittering gold and jewels. To the west, you see a basement entrance.
rooms.verboseDescription: The room is filled with dazzling treasures. You've hit the jackpot! There is a basement entrance to the west.

objects.name: gold
objects.roomDescription: Shiny gold coins and bars are neatly stacked on a table.
objects.generalRoomDescription: There are shiny gold coins and bars.

objects.name: jewels
objects.description: Sparkling jewels of various colors and sizes.
objects.roomDescription: Sparkling jewels of various colors and sizes are displayed in a glass case.
objects.generalRoomDescription: There are sparkling jewels of various colors and sizes.
